steps.intro:
Welcome to the new Red Hat Knowledgebase experience.

This short tour will highlight new features and changes.
We've relocated elements from the right sidebar to allow the main content to fill more of your screen. The Knowledgebase is also now mobile-friendly, making it easy to view on all devices.
As a Red Hatter, you'll notice actions like Edit and Manage Revisions have been moved to an admin drawer to allow more space for content.
No matter where you are on the page, you can comment, rate, or follow using the buttons on the left.
Now you can let us know if content is helpful to you with a simple yes or no. You and the community benefit by helping us improve content.
If the author chooses, Articles now support a table of contents. This enables quick scanning of the content. Table of contents links make it easy to navigate directly to the information you need.
Comments have an updated look and feel and are now optimized for mobile.

Thanks for touring the new Knowledgebase experience.

Have feedback? Click the feedback button and tell us what you think.
